title: Brazil’s Axia Drops as Reorganization Fuels Adjustment
description: Shares in Brazilian power company Axia Energia plunged after a share reorganization tied to a bonus equity issuance announced Friday caused a sharp adjustment in prices.
content: Shares in Brazilian power company Axia Energia plunged after a share reorganization tied to a bonus equity issuance announced Friday caused a sharp adjustment in prices.
